"‚ö†Ô∏è Yes" : "No"}} Underlying Assets: {{#each underlyingAssets}} - {{name}} ({{symbol}}): {{balance}} {{/each}} , 4Ô∏è‚É£ **Readable Numbers:** - Format large numbers with commas (e.g., `15,000` instead of `15000`). - Display ETH values to 4 decimal places for easy reading. 5Ô∏è‚É£ **Fallback Message** If no Aave data is found, reply with: ‚ùå No Aave V3 positions found for this wallet. 6Ô∏è‚É£ **Example Telegram Output:** üìä Aave DeFi Health Report Wallet: 0xA221674eDB403A8F714F66Af74a2332c3CB5C0c3 Date: 2025-05-08 ‚ñ™Ô∏è Pool: Aave Lending Pool ‚Ä¢ Supply: $15,000.00 ‚Ä¢ Borrowed: $7,500.00 ‚Ä¢ Collateral: $15,000.00 ‚Ä¢ Health Factor: 2.00 ‚Ä¢ Liquidation Threshold: 1.05 ‚Ä¢ Liquidation Risk: No ‚Ä¢ Net Worth Underlying Assets: DAI: 10,000 USDC: 5,000 üîπ **Instructions:** - Fetch data directly from the Moralis API endpoints provided. - Parse and format the response according to the structure above. - Send the formatted message to the specified Telegram Chat ID. - If no data is available, send the fallback message instead. - This report should be updated every 30 minutes and triggered on critical health factors (<1.1). üß† OpenAI Chat Model üìå Model: `gpt-4o-mini` (high-speed, multi-modal optimized) üéØ Role: Processes prompts and generates DeFi summaries and insights üîó Connected to LangChain Agent node üì• Inputs: `Wallet_Address`, `current_date` üì§ Output: Natural language Telegram/Email report via AI Agent ‚úÖ Ensure your OpenAI API credentials are set "},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"9baa4c9d-2cb0-40bb-bdb8-cea460451024","name":"Sticky Note11","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[3240,-1400],"parameters":{"width":1280,"height":2180,"content":"# üß† AAVE Portfolio Professional AI Agent ‚Äì Full System Documentation A next-generation AI-powered DeFi portfolio analyzer built to monitor **multiple wallet addresses** and generate structured Aave V3 health reports via Telegram and Email using LangChain + GPT-4o + Moralis API. --- ## üß© Included Components (Workflows) > Download and install the following nodes and credentials to ensure full system operation. | Component Name | Function | | -------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | | ‚úÖ Schedule Trigger | Runs the agent periodically (e.g. every hour) | | ‚úÖ Google Sheets Wallet Loader | Reads wallet addresses from a Google Sheet | | ‚úÖ Set Variables | Injects wallet address + current date into the flow | | ‚úÖ AAVE Portfolio Professional AI Agent | LangChain Agent calling OpenAI + Moralis APIs to analyze wallet health | | ‚úÖ Moralis API Nodes (3) | Fetches DeFi summary, positions, and Aave V3-specific data | | ‚úÖ OpenAI Chat Model | Provides GPT-4o-mini language model for report generation | | ‚úÖ Format Email | Converts AI output into styled HTML + plain text | | ‚úÖ Telegram Message Delivery | Sends summary report to Telegram chat | | ‚úÖ Gmail Email Sender | Sends full HTML report to configured email address | --- ## ‚öôÔ∏è Installation Instructions ### Step 1: Import Workflow 1. Open your **n8n editor UI**. 2. Import the `AAVE_Portfolio_Professional_AI_Agent.json` file. 3. Ensure all nodes are **connected**, especially Google Sheets ‚Üí AI Agent. ### Step 2: Google Sheets Setup 1. Create a new sheet with a column titled `wallet_address`. 2. Add the Ethereum wallet addresses you want to monitor in each row. 3. Connect your Google Sheets OAuth2 credential to the workflow. ### Step 3: Credentials Setup | Service | Type | Setup Instructions | | -------- | ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | | Moralis | HTTP Header Auth | Add `X-API-Key: YOUR_MORALIS_KEY` | | OpenAI | OpenAI API | Use `gpt-4o-mini` or your preferred model | | Gmail | Gmail OAuth2 | Connect your Google Account for email delivery | | Telegram | Telegram Bot API | Link your bot with the correct Chat ID (`539847013` or as needed) | --- ## üñ•Ô∏è System Overview **Data Flow:** ``` [Scheduler or Manual Run] ‚Üí [Google Sheet: Wallets] ‚Üí [Set Wallet + Date] ‚Üí [Moralis API Data Fetch] ‚Üí [LangChain + GPT Summary] ‚Üí [Telegram + Email Report Delivery] ``` **Analysis Includes:** * Supply / Borrow / Collateral per pool * Liquidation threshold & health factor * Asset-level breakdowns (e.g., WBTC, USDC) * Liquidation risk alerts (‚ö†Ô∏è) --- ## üì¨ Output Format * Telegram Message: human-readable summary for each wallet * Email Report: full HTML + plain text with tables and asset detail * Includes dynamic wallet address and current date per report --- ## üîß Customization Ideas * Add Telegram commands like `/aave 0x123...` to trigger on-demand * Set health-factor alerts (< 1.2) to notify immediately * Export to Notion, CSV, or build dashboard integrations --- ## üöÄ Support & Licensing üîó **Don Jayamaha ‚Äì LinkedIn** [http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr](http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr) ¬© 2025 Treasurium Capital Limited Company. readme:
A next-generation **AI-powered DeFi health monitor** that tracks wallet positions across **Aave V3** using GPT-4o and LangChain. It delivers **human-readable reports** via **Telegram and Gmail** , triggered on schedule or manually. Built for professionals monitoring **multiple DeFi wallets**.

* * *

## üß© System Components

Component | Role  
---|---  
‚úÖ Scheduler | Triggers the workflow periodically  
‚úÖ Google Sheets Wallet Loader | Loads all monitored wallet addresses  
‚úÖ Set Variables | Injects dynamic wallet + date  
‚úÖ AAVE Portfolio AI Agent | GPT-4o + LangChain AI that generates human-readable summaries  
‚úÖ Moralis API Nodes (3) | Collect Aave V3 supply/borrow/collateral data  
‚úÖ OpenAI Chat Model (gpt-4o-mini) | Interprets on-chain data and explains it  
‚úÖ Telegram Delivery | Sends summary to Telegram chat  
‚úÖ Gmail Email Sender | Sends full HTML report to email  
‚úÖ HTML Formatter | Beautifies AI output into email structure  
  
* * *

## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works

  1. Scheduled or manual trigger

  2. Pulls wallet addresses from Google Sheets

  3. For each wallet:

     * Pulls Aave data from Moralis
     * GPT-4o AI generates report
     * Sends summary to Telegram
     * Sends full HTML report via Gmail



* * *

## üõ† Installation Steps

### 1\. **Import the Workflow**

  * Upload `AAVE_Portfolio_Professional_AI_Agent.json` to your n8n instance.



### 2\. **Connect These Credentials**

Service | Required Credential Type  
---|---  
Moralis | HTTP Header Auth (X-API-Key)  
OpenAI | GPT-4o via OpenAI API Key  
Telegram | Telegram Bot API Token  
Gmail | Gmail OAuth2 Credential  
  
### 3\. **Create Google Sheet**

  * Column name must be: `wallet_address`
  * Add wallet addresses you want monitored



* * *

## üì¨ Output Format

### Telegram Message Example
    
    
    üìä Aave DeFi Health Report  
    Wallet: 0xABC...123  
    Date: 2025-05-21
    
    ‚ñ™Ô∏è Pool: Aave Ethereum USDC  
    ‚Ä¢ Supply: $10,040  
    ‚Ä¢ Borrowed: $5,500  
    ‚Ä¢ Health Factor: 3.43  
    ‚Ä¢ Liquidation Risk: No  
    

### Email Report

  * Full HTML + plain text versions
  * Auto-generated date + styled per wallet
  * Includes notes and threshold warnings



* * *

## üß† Smart Features

  * GPT-4o generates clear human summaries
  * Monitors multiple wallets in one run
  * Flags liquidation risk dynamically
  * Logs daily performance snapshots



* * *

## üí° Customization Ideas

  * Add Telegram slash command `/aave <wallet>`
  * Expand to monitor **Compound** , **Lido** , or **Uniswap**
  * Export to Notion, Slack, or Data Studio



* * *

## üßæ Licensing & Attribution

¬© 2025 **Treasurium Capital Limited Company**

Architecture, prompts, and report formatting are **intellectual property protected**.  
**No unauthorized rebranding, redistribution, or resale permitted.**

üîó For support or licensing inquiries: [LinkedIn ‚Äì Don Jayamaha](https://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr)

* * *

üöÄ **Track all your Aave DeFi positions using AI‚Äîdelivered via Telegram + Gmail.**  
**Perfect for funds, traders, and DeFi power users.**

* * *

### üé• Watch the Live Demo:

[![AAVE Portfolio AI Agent Demo](https://img.youtube.com/vi/teLNnkoGnJI/maxresdefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/teLNnkoGnJI)
